title: add a interface GraceFullShutDown to supoort customized action in shutdown
body:
Introduce:
In shutdown stage of a project ,gracefull shut down is necessary.
There is a application listener ,but it is not enough,some actions should be done with dubbo.
For example, Kafka producer should flush messages to the broker after protocol destroyed.
Another,MQ consumer should not poll new messages any more after registries destroyed.

Changelog

add a interface GraceFulShutDown
2.update SpringExtensionFactory.ShutdownHookListener to support customized actions when spring bean exists which implements GraceFullShutDown
3.add a unit test GraceFulShutDownTest

Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

- [x] Make sure there is a [GITHUB_issue](https://github.com/apache/dubbo/issues) field for the change (usually before you start working on it). title: add a interface GraceFullShutDown to supoort customized action in shutdown
body:
Introduce:
In shutdown stage of a project ,gracefull shut down is necessary.
There is a application listener ,but it is not enough,some actions should be done with dubbo.
For example, Kafka producer should flush messages to the broker after protocol destroyed.
Another,MQ consumer should not poll  new messages any more after registries destroyed. 

Changelog
1. add a interface GraceFulShutDown
2.update SpringExtensionFactory.ShutdownHookListener to support customized actions when spring bean exists which implements GraceFullShutDown
3.add a unit test GraceFulShutDownTest

title: support method and positive timeout for sync
body:
Fix #4435 

## What is the purpose of the change

1. Assume that service have sayHello and sayHi method. The sync timeout for sayHello is 1000, but not 800. We have to get method timeout for AsyncToSyncInvoke call. 

```
<dubbo:reference id="demoService" interface="com.ctrip.Demo" timeout="1000">
  <dubbo:method name="sayHello">
    <dubbo:parameter key="timeout" value="800"/>
  </dubbo:method>
</dubbo:reference>
```

2. For the CompletableFuture, it will throw TimeoutException for negative timeout value.
